Valentino Rossi Ungkapkan Rasa Simpati pada Jorge Lorenzo
01 Nov 2019, 12:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Monster Energy Yamaha, Valentino Rossi, mengungkapkan rasa simpati kepada Jorge Lorenzo, yang tengah mengalami masa-masa sulit di Repsol Honda musim ini. Kepada Motorsport.com di sela MotoGP Sepang, Malaysia, Rossi mengaku dapat memahami kegundahan Lorenzo.
Saat ini Lorenzo sangat terpuruk dengan RC213V, belum juga masuk 10 besar, dan sejak kembali dari cedera punggung, masuk 15 saja ia harus susah payah. Rossi pun mengaku bahwa kesulitan inilah yang ia rasakan di Ducati pada 2011-2012. Tak betah dengan keterpurukan, ia akhirnya kembali ke Yamaha pada 2013.
"Di Ducati, saya mengalami situasi yang sama dengan yang dialami Jorge sekarang. Sejak uji coba pertama saya sudah hilang rasa percaya diri pada ban depan. Ducati adalah motor yang tak bisa diadaptasikan dengan gaya saya. Saya pun harus kembali ke Yamaha demi kompetitif lagi," ujarnya.
text:
Valentino Rossi Expresses Sympathy for Jorge Lorenzo
Nov 1, 2019, 12:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Yamaha Energy Monster racer, Valentino Rossi, expresses sympathy for Jorge Lorenzo, who is experiencing hard times at Repsol Honda this season. To Motorsport.com on the sidelines of the Sepang MotoGP, Malaysia, Rossi claimed to be able to understand Lorenzo's anxiety.
Currently Lorenzo is very bad with RC213V, not yet in the top 10, and since returning from a back injury, entering 15 alone he must be struggling. Rossi also claimed that this difficulty he felt at Ducati in 2011-2012. Not comfortable with the downturn, he finally returned to Yamaha in 2013.
"At Ducati, I experienced the same situation that Jorge is experiencing now. Since the first trial I have lost confidence in the front tire. Ducati is a motor that cannot be adapted to my style. I also have to go back to Yamaha to be competitive again, "he said.
